content.text: Hey! I'm glad you're doing well. How's school going?
It's going really well! I'm looking forward to spending more time on my hobbies this summer.
That's great! What are some of your hobbies?
I like to watch tv and movies, read comics, and listen to music. I also like to grow my own vegetables and take daily walks.
Those are all great hobbies! I love watching movies too. What are some of your favorite movies?
I love all kinds of movies, but I especially love Disney movies and action movies.
I love Disney movies too! I love the animation and the stories.
I'm glad we have something in common! What are some of your favorite Disney movies?
I love all of the Disney movies, but my favorites are The Lion King, Beauty and the Beast, and The Little Mermaid.
Those are all great movies! I love The Lion King too. It's so sad, but so beautiful.
It is sad, but it's also so inspiring.
I agree. It's a great movie.
It is. I'm glad we have something in common!
